meanings.sent1: The playground bully always picked on the wimp.
meanings.sent2: Don't be a wimp, stand up for yourself!
meanings.sent3: The wimp ran away from a tiny spider.
meanings.sent4: His confidence was as fragile as a wimp in a storm.
meanings.sent5: The wimp's fear was palpable in the room.

meanings.definition: To behave in a cowardly or weak manner.
meanings.sent1: He tends to wimp out when faced with challenges.
meanings.sent2: Don't wimp out now, we need your help!
meanings.sent3: She wimped out of trying the new roller coaster.
meanings.sent4: His determination wimped away like a candle in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The team cannot afford to wimp in the final moments.
